project.description: Build Squawk VM (only) for National Instruments cRIO/vxWorks.

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
cd %WORKSPACE%\trunk\sdkbuilder
c:\windriver\wrenv.exe -p vxworks-6.3 buildvm.bat set finalval=%ERRORLEVEL%
cd ..\..
rd /s /q "trunk\buildartifacts"
md trunk\buildartifacts md trunk\buildartifacts\romizer md trunk\buildartifacts\translator md trunk\buildartifacts\debugger md trunk\buildartifacts\debugger\preprocessed md trunk\buildartifacts\cldc md trunk\buildartifacts\cldc\preprocessed md trunk\buildartifacts\cldc-native-declarations md trunk\buildartifacts\imp md trunk\buildartifacts\imp\preprocessed md trunk\buildartifacts\debugger-proxy md trunk\buildartifacts\hosted-support
copy trunk\squawk\build.properties trunk\buildartifacts copy trunk\squawk\build.jar trunk\buildartifacts copy trunk\squawk\build-commands.jar trunk\buildartifacts copy trunk\squawk\squawk.out trunk\buildartifacts copy trunk\squawk\squawk.suite trunk\buildartifacts copy trunk\squawk\squawk.suite.api trunk\buildartifacts copy trunk\squawk\squawk.suite.metadata trunk\buildartifacts copy trunk\squawk\romizer\classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\romizer\classes.jar copy trunk\squawk\squawk.jar trunk\buildartifacts\squawk.jar copy trunk\squawk\squawk_classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\squawk_classes.jar copy trunk\squawk\cldc\classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\cldc\classes.jar xcopy /E trunk\squawk\cldc\preprocessed trunk\buildartifacts\cldc\preprocessed copy trunk\squawk\cldc-native-declarations\classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\cldc-native-declarations\classes.jar copy trunk\squawk\imp\classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\imp\classes.jar xcopy /E trunk\squawk\imp\preprocessed trunk\buildartifacts\imp\preprocessed copy trunk\squawk\translator\classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\translator\classes.jar copy trunk\squawk\debugger\classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\debugger\classes.jar xcopy /E trunk\squawk\debugger\preprocessed trunk\buildartifacts\debugger\preprocessed copy trunk\squawk\debugger-proxy\classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\debugger-proxy\classes.jar copy trunk\squawk\hosted-support\classes.jar trunk\buildartifacts\hosted-support\classes.jar
cd trunk\buildartifacts ant -file ..\sdkbuilder\zipsquawkfiles.xml -Dzipname=squawkbuild -Dhere=..\buildartifacts
echo final error level = %finalval% exit %finalval%
